refnamediv.refpurpose: Compiles, Instantiates and runs a compiled Faust program.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Faustgen will invoke the just-in-time compiler, instantiate and run a Faust program.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Scode -- a string containing a Faust program.
ihandle -- a handle to the Faust DSP instance, which can be used to access its controls with faustctl.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the faustgen opcode, with a simple program that mixes two inputs:
idsp,a1 faustgen "process=+;",ain1,ain2
